name: mcp-on-demand
description: Load MCP servers on-demand instead of keeping them in context permanently. Zero token overhead when not in use.

scripts.health: curl -s http://127.0.0.1:9876/health | node -e "process.stdin.on('data', d => console.log(JSON.stringify(JSON.parse(d), null, 2)))"

author: Mattias Fagerlund
